name: actionhw
story:
Action Hollywood was produced by Proyesel in 1995.

Action Hollywood is a top-view hack and slash arcade game released by TCH in 1995. Gameplay is similar to "Gauntlet." and in some ways similar to games like Smash TV. You can choose to start at a Hollywood shoot set in "Temples of Chaos," "Excaliwood," "Transylvania" or "Galaxy War."
